headline: Is DoorDash Partnership Expansion Changing the E-Commerce Story for Kroger (KR)?
summary: On September 29, DoorDash announced the expansion of its grocery delivery partnership with Kroger to include all 2,700 US stores, making Kroger the largest grocery retailer on DoorDash’s platform and allowing customers nationwide access to fresh foods, household essentials, and private-label brands through the app. This collaboration highlights Kroger’s commitment to enhancing convenience and broadening its digital reach in an increasingly competitive grocery delivery sector, where consumer...

headline: McDonald's Drives Sustainable Growth Through Loyalty & Menu Innovation
summary: MCD fuels growth with loyalty gains, menu hits like the Chicken Big Mac and global expansion despite inflation headwinds.

headline: TOP CHEF CANADA ANNOUNCES ITS SEASON 12 SPONSORS
summary: Today, Top Chef Canada announced Season 12 sponsors, comprised of seven new and returning brand partners. These sponsorships include in-show integrations, custom challenges, and premium prizes in every episode. Season 12 of Top Chef Canada, a #1 specialty entertainment program*, premieres Tuesday, October 14 at 10 p.m. ET/PT on Flavour Network and streaming exclusively on STACKTV. headline: DoorDash finalizes its $3.9 billion acquisition of UK's Deliveroo
summary: DoorDash has finalized its acquisition of the U.K. food delivery company Deliveroo, saying Thursday that the boards of both companies approved the nearly $4 billion deal announced earlier this year.  Word of DoorDash's interest in Deliveroo began to circulate in April and the San Francisco company quickly confirmed that it had agreed to buy Deliveroo for $3.9 billion in cash.  The deal, which was approved by a British court, will help DoorDash to expand its business in Europe, Asia and the Middle East.

The deal, which was approved by a British court, will help DoorDash to expand its business in Europe, Asia and the Middle East.

headline: Kroger to use DoorDash’s DashMart service for delivery
summary: Building on a nationwide partnership announced last week, the grocer will rely on the service’s sites to fulfill groceries and household goods.

raw.headline: Kroger to use DoorDash’s DashMart service for delivery

headline: DoorDash Completes Acquisition of Deliveroo
summary: SAN FRANCISCO, October 02, 2025--DoorDash, Inc. (NASDAQ: DASH) ("DoorDash"), a leading global local commerce platform, refers to the announcement that the boards of directors of DoorDash and Deliveroo plc ("Deliveroo") agreed on the terms of a final cash offer for the entire issued and to-be-issued ordinary share capital of Deliveroo, as recommended by Deliveroo’s Independent Committee. The acquisition was carried out by means of a Court-sanctioned scheme of arrangement under Part 26 of the UK C
